articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Tech investor Prosus to buy Just Eat Takeaway.com for $4.3 billion - CNBC
articles.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com is poised to be acquired by Dutch technology investor Prosus in a deal worth roughly 4.1 billion euros ($4.3 billion).
articles.content: "We are very excited for Just Eat Takeaway.com to join the Prosus group and the opportunity to create a European tech champion," Fabricio Bloisi, CEO of Prosus and Naspers group, said in a statement.… [+318 chars]

articles.title: Asia stocks track Wall St losses; tech skittish ahead of Nvidia earnings - Investing.com
articles.description: Asia stocks track Wall St losses; tech skittish ahead of Nvidia earnings
articles.content: Investing.com-- Most Asian stocks fell on Monday, tracking steep declines on Wall Street amid persistent concerns over a cooling U.S. economy and increased trade tariffs under President Donald Trump.… [+3203 chars]
